description: This Dart source file defines an AuthInterceptor class that extends Dio's Interceptor to handle attaching JWT tokens to HTTP requests and managing authentication errors such as 401 Unauthorized responses.

classes.name: AuthInterceptor
classes.description: A custom interceptor for Dio HTTP client to attach JWT tokens and handle auth-related errors.

methods.name: onRequest
methods.description: Overrides the Dio Interceptor's onRequest; attaches JWT token to request headers unless the request is for login or registration.

methods.name: onError
methods.description: Handles error responses; specifically clears stored tokens if a 401 Unauthorized error occurs to force re-login.
